twoSetSkill.name: Earthquake 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When there are enemies nearby, emit a seismic wave with a 3-meter radius from the host every 5s. For every 3 seismic waves, the first 2 will knock down non-boss enemies and the 3rd will stun non-boss enemies for 3s.

threeSetSkill.name: Planetary Orbits 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When there are 3 or more enemies on the battlefield, all allies gain 15% Physical DMG and 25% Crit DMG. This effect cannot stack.
